name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NewsTab - Smart New Tab with News

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your new tab into a productivity hub with news, bookmarks, weather updates, and shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NewsTab is a simple yet flexible extension that updates your new tab page with useful tools and news. It includes features such as:

• RSS News feeds refreshed frequently. 
• Add any news feeds you wish to see on your new tab page
• Show and hide different RSS feeds or add/remove them completely
• Show local weather on your new tab page
• Show the date and time every time you open a new tab
• Handy search bar that uses your preferred search engine
• Quick access to your bookmarks, recent sites, and most-visited
• Search and filter through your bookmarks and recent sites
• Drag and drop your most-used shortcuts on the main screen
• Beautiful background images that update hourly

With NewsTab you will always be up to date with the latest happenings, customized to your interests.
